component.name: YAMS: Yet Another Media Server
component.summary: YAMS is a simplistic but well integrated Media Server for small venues

description.p: YAMS: Yet Another Media Server is a minimalist but well-integrated media server solution. It aims to support small venues that cannot spend large amounts to license complete media server or VJing solutions for live events.

ul.li: Support for 1-3 video layers with independent playback
Simple composition with opacity control and crossfade transitions
Hardware-accelerated video decoding on Linux and Windows
Control via MIDI, OSC, sACN, and ArtNet protocols
CITP support for professional lighting console integration (GrandMA 3)
CMake build system with GoogleTest integration
Linux and Windows CI/CD with NSIS installer
